activities: Griffin Personnel Group provides Pre-employment Screening Services.  The information requested from EU companies will consist of records pertaining to: 1)Criminal History, 2)Credit History, 3)Employment, 4)Education, 5)General interviews involving information as to an individual's character, work habits, performance, and experience, along with reasons for termination of past employment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Netherlands, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Upon receipt of complaint, GPG will provide the individual filing a complaint with a full copy of any information obtained in regards to them.  If any of the information contained in that report is disputed by the individual, GPG will conduct a full re-verification to confirm the accuracy of the initial results.  The outcome of the re-verification will also be provided to the complainant along with contact information for the source of all information obtained; EU Data Protection Authorities
